http://interviews.slashdot.org/article.pl?sid=05/10/21/0550213&from=rss
Late in September we gave you the chance to put your questions to
eminent game designer Sid Meier, the man behind the Civilization
series. Creator of a series that has squandered the spare time of many
a reader of this site, he took time out of the Civ IV release window
to hand us back some thoughtful responses to your queries. Read on for
the results of "Ask Sid Meier".
